name: Thai Cucumber And Mint Salsa
description: This salsa makes a wonderful garnish for grilled fish. It can be used as a salad, garnished with grilled shrimp, bass or snapper, as well as chicken.
keywords: cucumber, mint, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 3 medium cucumbers, peeled, seeded, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 small Thai chili pepper, seeded, deveined and minced
1/2 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
1 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a large glass or ceramic bowl. Cover and set aside in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving. Season to taste with additional salt and pepper. Keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.
